channel.title: Demo on Burgers & Bytes
channel.description: Recent content in Demo on Burgers & Bytes

item.title: The demo shift: from FAB to BAF
item.description: Let’s be honest. You can prepare your demo perfectly. You’ve tested the feature ten times. You’ve got a backup video, screenshots, even a second laptop ready, just in case the Wi-Fi doesn’t work. But here’s the thing: Even if everything works flawlessly, your demo can still fall flat. Because a smooth technical demo isn’t a story. And without a story, your audience won’t remember what you showed or why it mattered.
